item.title: Why Singapore's media should be the backbone of local football
item.description: The S.League has started and to be honest, I am concerned that the media has not stepped in and support the league. Sure, StarHub has been sponsoring the LionsXII and the League Cup. But why hasn't MediaCorp or Singtel come in to throw their weight behind our national league? The first headlines propping the Straits Times last week after the first couple of games before even the 1st round was over, was discussing the low attendance despite the new season.
